sumDscr.universe: Age limits: 18-75 years Location: national Name of country: Netherlands Other: additional data-set based on the responses of the 146 interviewers

dataColl.sampProc: multi-stage sample: first, self-selective municipalities were determined on the basis of the formula hi / h* 1750 ge 6;:hi=no of households in municipality;: h=total no of households, 1750= total no of households to be approached;: cluster -size=3;: other municipalities selected at random, taking into account their size selection of respondents at fixed addresses within household: 50-50 chance with a maximum of two;: details are availableon the questionnaire;: no of call backs= three Number of unit original/losses: 2328 addresses * 511+23=534;: during processing their appeared 54 additional lost cases * 237 second interviews in large families * 1977
dataColl.collSitu: data-collector identification, call back number, characteristics of data-collector-filled out complete questionnaire as part of instruction, presence of other people, special events: reaction of those attending interview
dataColl.actMin: Other: fieldwork controlled by mail and some personal revisits
dataColl.weight: criteria: age * sex * marital status * district, based on data from P0079;: coefficients: max=2;: min=0.5

fileDescr.dataChck: complete study stored * check on total no of cards, wild codes eliminated
